participant_1.background:
My biggest challenge was overcoming my eating disorder.
I would like to be reincarnated as a dog so I can continue to be with my family.
i enjoy taking walks.
My weight is perfect for my body type and lifestyle.
Music is a way for me to express myself.

participant_2.background:
I remember buying my first police uniform.
i listen to pink when i am painting.
I like to wear comfortable clothes that allow me to move around and express myself.
I like to listen to country music because it reminds me of my family and home.
i hate fast food.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
It's been pretty good, thanks!  What about you?
It's going well, thanks!  I was just thinking about how much I enjoy music.
What kinds of music do you like to listen to?
I like to listen to a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is country music.  It always reminds me of home.
That's awesome!  I like country music too.  What are some of your favorite country artists?
I love listening to George Strait, Alan Jackson, and Miranda Lambert.
Those are all great artists!  I love Miranda Lambert.
Have you ever been to a country music concert?
Yes, I have!  I went to a Miranda Lambert concert a few years ago and it was amazing.
That sounds like it was a lot of fun!  I've always wanted to go to a country music concert.
You should go!  It's a great experience.
I will!  Thanks for the recommendation.
